manzils.text: Ta Sin Mim
Awa ndi mawu omveka a Buku la Korani
Iwe mwina ukhoza kudziononga ndi madandaulo chifukwa cha kusakhulupirira kwawo
Ngati Ife tifuna, tikhoza kuwavumbulutsira chizindikiro chochokera kumwamba chimene makosi awo adzakhota modzichepetsa
Palibe chenjezo latsopano limene limadza kuchokera kwa Mwini chisoni chosatha koma iwo amalikana
Ndithudi iwo amakana mawu a Mulungu koma nkhani zidzadza kwa iwo zokhudza zinthu zimene iwo amazichita chipongwe
Kodi iwo saona nthaka, mmene ife tameretsamo mbewu zabwino zosiyanasiyana
Ndithudi m’menemu muli chizindikiro komabe ambiri a iwo sakhulupirira ayi
Ndithudi Ambuye wako ndiye Mwini mphamvu zonse ndiponso Mwini chisoni chosatha
Ndipo pamene Ambuye wako adamuitana Mose adanena kuti, “Pita kwa anthu opanda chilungamo.”
Kodi anthu a Farawo sangaope
Iye adati, “Ambuye wanga! Ndithudi ine ndili kuopa kuti adzandikana.”
“Ndipondikhozakupsamtimandikulepherakuyankhula. Tumizani Aroni.”
“Ndipo iwo ali ndi mangawa ndi ine ndipo ndichita mantha kuti akhoza kukandipha.”
Mulungu adati, “Nkosatheka kutero! Kotero pitani nonse awiri ndi zizindikiro zathu. Ife tidzakhala ndi inu ndipo tidzamva.”
Ndipo mukakafika kwa Farawo mukamuuze kuti, “Ife ndife Atumwi ochokera kwa Ambuye wa zolengedwa zonse.”
“Motero alekeni ana a Israyeli kuti apite ndi ife.”
(Farawo) adati, “Kodi ife sitidakurere iwe pamene udali wamng’ono? Ndipo iwe unakhala pakati pathu zaka zambiri.”
“Ndipo iwe udachita chimene udachita. Ndithudi iwe ndiwe mmodzi wa anthu osathokoza.”
(Mose) adati, “Ine ndidachita chimenecho popeza nthawi imeneyo ndidali wosadziwa china chilichonse.”
“Motero ine ndidathawa inu nonse pa nthawi imene ndidakuopani koma tsopano Ambuye wanga wandipatsa luntha ndiponso wandipanga ine kukhala mmodzi mwa Atumwi ake.”
“Ndipo uwu ndi mwayi umene ubwino wake iwe uli kundinyogodola. Iwe wasandutsa ana a Israyeli kukhala akapolo ako.”
Farawo adati, “Kodi Ambuye wa zolengedwa zonse ndani?”
(Mose) adati, “Ambuye wa kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi ndi zonse zimene zili pakati pawo ngati inu mufuna kukhulupirira.”
(Farawo) adawafunsa anthu amene adamuzungulira! “Kodi muli kumva zimene ali kunenazi.”
(Mose) adapitiriza kuti, “Ambuye wanu ndiponso Ambuye wa makolo anu akale.”
(Farawo) adati, “Ndithudi Mtumwi amene watumizidwa kwa inu ndi wopenga.”
(Mose) adati, “Iye ndi Ambuye wa kum’mawa ndi kumadzulo ndi zonse zimene zikhala kumeneko ngati muli ozindikira.”
(Farawo) adayankha kuti, “Ngati iwe utumikira mulungu wina kupatula ine, ndithudi ndikupanga kukhala mmodzi wa anthu okhala ku ndende.”
(Mose) adafunsa kuti, “Kodi zingakhale choncho ngakhale nditakulangiza chizindikiro choonekeratu? “
(Farawo) adati, “Tilangize chizindikiro chako ngati zonse zimene unena ndi zoona.”
Motero Mose adaponya ndodo yake pansi ndipo nthawi yomweyo idasanduka njoka yeniyeni
Ndipo Iye adatulutsa dzanja lake ndipo nthawi yomweyo lidasanduka loyera kwa iwo amene adaliona
Farawo adauza nduna zake kuti, “Ndithudi munthu uyu ndi wodziwa matsenga.”
“Iyeyu afuna kukuchotsani m’dziko lanu ndi matsenga ake. Kodi ulangizi wanu ndi wotani ndipo ukupereka langizo lanji?”
Iwo adati, “Muyambe mwawasunga iye pamodzi ndi m’bale wake kwa kanthawi kochepa. Tumizani mithenga ku mizinda yanu
Abweretse kwa inu munthu aliyense yemwe ndi wodziwa matsenga kwambiri.”
Motero anthu amatsengawa adasonkhanitsidwa patsiku lodziwika lomwe adagwirizana
Ndipo anthu adafunsidwa kuti, “Kodi nonse mudzasonkhana?”
“Kuti mwina ife tikhoza kudzatsatira a matsenga ngati iwo atapambana.”
Ndipo pamene anthu onse amatsenga adadza kwa Farawo, iwo adati kwa Farawo, “Kodi mudzatilipira ngati titapambana?”
Iye adati, “Inde. Ndipo ndithudi inu mudzakhala kufupi ndi Ine.”
Mose adawauza kuti, “Ponyani pansi chilichonse chimene mufuna kuponya.”
Ndipo iwo adaponya zingwe ndi ndodo zawo ndipo adati: “Mwa mphamvu ya Farawo, ndithudi, ife tipambana.”
Ndipo Mose adaponya ndodo yake ndipo nthawi yomweyo idameza zonse zabodza zimene iwo adapanga
Ndipo anthu amatsenga onse aja adagwa pansi mogwada
Iwo adati, “Ife takhulupirira mwa Ambuye wa zolengedwa zonse.”
“Ambuye wa Mose ndi Aroni”

Farawo adati, “Kodi inu mwakhulupirira mwa iye pamene ine sindinakupatseni chilolezo? Ndithudi iye ndi mtsogoleri wanu amene adakuphunzitsani matsenga. Ndithudi posachedwapa mudzazindikira. Ndithudi ine ndidzadula manja anu ndi miyendo yanu moisiyanitsa. Ndidzakudulani dzanja lamanja ndi mwendo wamanzere ndiponso ndidzakupachikani pa mtanda.”
Iwo adati, “Zilibe kanthu chifukwa ndithudi ife tidzabwerera kwa Ambuye wathu.”
“Ndithudi Ife tili ndi chiyembekezo kuti Ambuye wathu adzatikhululukira machimo athu popeza ndife oyamba kukhulupirira.”
Ndipo tidamulamula Mose kuti, “Nyamuka nthawi ya usiku ndi akapolo anga chifukwa, ndithudi, inu mulondoledwa ndi gulu la adani anu.”
Ndipo Farawo adatumiza mithenga ku mizinda yonse
“Ndithudi anthu amenewa ndi kagulu ka anthu ochepa.”
“Ndithudi anthu amenewa atipsetsa mtima.”
“Ife tonse tili tcheru.”
Ndipo tidawachotsa m’minda ndi mu a kasupe
Ndiponso m’chuma ndi m’malo alionse olemekezeka
Kotero tidawapanga ana a Israyeli kukhala alowa m’malo a zinthu za anthu a Farawo
Pamene dzuwa linali kutuluka, iwo adalondoledwa ndi adani awo
Ndipo pamene magulu awiriwa adaonana wina ndi mnzake, anthu a Mose adati, “Ndithudi atipeza.”
Mose adati, “Iyayi. Ndithudi Ambuye wanga ali ndi ine ndipo adzanditsogolera.”
Ndipo tidalamulira Mose kuti, “Menya madzi a m’nyanja ndi ndodo yako.” Ndipo nyanja idagawanika pakati, mbali iliyonse idali ngati phiri lalikulu
Ndipo anthu a Farawo tidawayandikitsa ndi nyanja ija
Ndipo Ife tidapulumutsa Mose ndi onse amene adali ndi iye
Ndipo tidamiza ena
Ndithudi mu ichi muli phunziro komabe anthu ambiri sakhulupirira ayi
Ndithudi Ambuye wako! Iye ndiye Mwini mphamvu zonse ndi Mwini chisoni chosatha
Ndipo afotokozere nkhani za Abrahamu
Pamenepo iye adanena kwa abambo ake ndiponso kwa anthu ake kuti, “Kodi ndi chiyani chimene inu muli kupembedza?”
Iwo adati, “Timatumikira mafano ndipo timapempha kwa iwo modzipereka kwambiri.”
Ndipo adati, “Kodi iwo amakumvani pamene mumawapempha?”
“Kodi amakuthandizani kapena kukuonongani?”
Iwo adati, “Iyayi. Koma ife tidawapeza makolo athu akupembedza mafano.”
Iye adati, “Kodi inu muli kuzidziwa zimene muli kuzipembedza?”
“Inu ndiponso makolo anu akale?”
“Ndithudi onse ndi adani anga kupatula Ambuye wachilengedwe.”
“Amene adandipanga ine ndipo ndiye amene amandipatsa chilangizo.”
“Ndipo ndiye amene amandipatsa chakudya ndi chakumwa.”
“Ndipo ndikadwala, ndi Iye amene amandichiza.”
“Ndipo ndiye amene adzandipangitsa kuti ndife ndi kudzandibwezeranso moyo.”
“Ndi amene ine ndimayembekezera kuti adzandikhululukira machimo anga pa tsiku lachiweruzo”
Ambuye ndipatseni luntha ndipo mundilole kuti ndikhale pakati pa anthu ochita zabwino
Ndipatseni ulemerero umene udzatchulidwe ndi mibadwo yomwe ikubwera mtsogolo
Ndipo ndiikeni m’gulu la anthu amene adzakhala kumalo a mtendere a ku Paradiso
Akhululukireni abambo anga ndithudi iwo ali mmodzi mwa anthu osochera
Musadzandichititse manyazi patsiku limene anthu adzaukitsidwa kwa akufa
Tsiku limene chuma ndi ana sizidzathandiza wina aliyense
Kupatula yekhayo amene adzadza kwa Mulungu ndi mtima woyera
Pamenepo Paradiso idzayandikiritsidwa kwa anthu angwiro
Ndipo Gahena idzaonetsedwa poyera kwa anthu ochimwa
Mawu adzanenedwa kwa iwo kuti, “Kodi mafano anu aja amene mumatumikira ali kuti?”
Kuwonjezera pa Mulungu weniweni? Kodi iwo akhoza kukuthandizani inu kapena kudzithandiza okha?”
Ndipo iwo ndi onse ochimwa adzaponyedwa ku Gahena
Ndiponso pamodzi ndi magulu onse a Satana
Iwo adzati pamene adzakhala ali kukangana kumeneko
“Pali Mulungu, ndithudi, ife tidali ochimwa moonekeratu.”
Pamene tidakusandutsani inu kukhala ofanana ndi Ambuye wa zolengedwa zonse
Palibe ena koma anthu ochita zoipa amene adatisocheretsa ife
Palibe wina woti angatipepesere ife
Ndiponso palibe bwenzi lenileni
Koma tikadakhalanso ndi moyo, tikadakhala anthu okhulupirira
Ndithudi mu zimenezi muli chizindikiro koma anthu ambiri sakhulupirira ayi
Ndithudi Ambuye wanu! Ndiye Mwini mphamvu zonse ndi Mwini chisoni chosatha
Anthu a m’badwo wa Nowa adakana Atumwi awo
Pamene Nowa adati, “Kodi inu simungaope Mulungu ndi kumumvera Iye?”
“Ndithudi ine ndine Mtumwi wanu wokhulupirika.”
“Motero opani Mulungu ndipo mundimvere ine.”
“Ine sindikupemphani malipiro ena alionse chifukwa palibe wina aliyense amene angandilipire ine kupatula Ambuye wa zolengedwa zonse.”
“Kotero opani Mulungu ndipo mundimvere ine.”
Iwo adati, “Kodi ife tikukhulupirire iwe pamene anthu onyozeka ndiwo amene amakutsatira iwe?”
Nowa adati, “Kodi ine ndikudziwa chiyani za chimene iwo amachita?”
“Ambuye wanga ndiye amene akhoza kuweruza ngati mumazindikira.”
“Ndipo ine sindidzathamangitsa anthu okhulupirira moona.”
“Ine ndine wopereka chenjezo poyera.”
Iwo adati, “Iwe Nowa; ngati siusiya zimene uchita udzaponyedwa miyala.”
Iye adati, “Ambuye wanga! Ndithudi anthu anga akundikana.”
Motero weruzani mwachilungamo pakati pa ine ndi iwo. Ndipulumutseni ine pamodzi ndi anthu okhulupirira amene ali ndi ine
Ife tidamupulumutsa iye pamodzi ndi iwo amene adali naye m’chombo
Ndipo pambuyo pake tidamiza ena onse ndi chigumula
Ndithudi mu chimenechi muli phunziro komabe ambiri sakhulupirira
Ndithudi Ambuye wako ndi Mwini mphamvu ndi Mwini chisoni chosatha
Anthu a ku Aad sanakhulupirire Atumwi awo
Pamene m’bale wawo Houd adati, “Kodi inu simungakhale ndi mantha ndi Mulungu?”
“Ndithudi ine ndine Mtumwi wanu wokhulupirika.”
“opani Mulungu ndipo munditsate ine.”
“Pa ntchito iyi, ine sindipempha malipiro kuchokera kwa inu chifukwa palibe wina amene angandilipire kupatula Ambuye wa zolengedwa zonse.”
“Kodi inu mukumamanga nyumba pamalo paliponse pokwera mofuna kudzisangalatsa?”
“Kodi muli kumanga nyumba zokongola ndi zolimba ngati kuti mudzakhalamo mpaka kalekale?”
“Ndipo pamene mumenya anthu mumamenya ngati anthu ankhanza.”
“Motero opani Mulungu, ndipo mundimvere ine.”
“Ndipo muopeni Iye amene wakupatsani inu zinthu zonse zimene mumazidziwa.”
“Iye wakupatsani nyama ndi ana,”
“Ndiponso minda ndi a kasupe;”
“Ndithudi ine ndili kuchita mantha ndi chilango chimene chidzadza pa inu pa tsiku loopsa.”
Iwo adati, “Ndi chimodzimodzi kwa ife kaya utilalikira kapena ayi.”
“Zonse zimene uli kutiopseza nazo ndi chikhalidwe cha anthu amakedzana.”
“Ife sitidzalangidwa ayi.”
Iwo adamukana iye ndipo Ife tidawaononga onse. Ndithudi mu chimenechi muli phunziro koma ambiri sakhulupirira ayi
Ndithudi Ambuye wako ndiye Mwini mphamvu zonse ndi Mwini chisoni chosatha
Anthu a Thamoud adakana Atumwi awo
Pamene m’bale wawo Saleh adati, “Kodi inu simungakhale ndi mantha ndi Mulungu?”
“Ndithudi ine ndine Mtumwi wanu okhulupirika.”
“Motero opani Mulungu ndipo mundimvere ine.”
“Pa ntchito iyi ine sindili kukupemphani malipiro. Palibe wina amene angandilipire kupatula Ambuye wa zolengedwa zonse.”
“Kodi inu muganiza kuti mudzasiyidwa mu mtendere wa m’dziko lino?”
“M’kati mwa minda ndi a kasupe.”
“Minda ya chimanga ndi mitengo ya tende imene yapatsa zipatso zambiri.”
“Ndipo muboola mapiri ndi kumangamo nyumba zanu mwaukatswiri;”
“Khalani ndi mantha ndi Mulungu ndipo mundimvere ine.”
“Musamvere malamulo a anthu oononga.”
“Amene amachita zoipa padziko lapansi ndipo sakonza makhalidwe awo.”
Iwo adati, “Iwe uli mmodzi mwa olodzedwa.”
“Iwe ndiwe munthu wonga ife tomwe. Tilangize chizindikiro ngati zimene ukunenazi ndi zoona”
Iye adati, “Iyi ndi ngamira yaikazi. Iyo idzamwa madzi patsiku lake ndipo inu mudzamwa patsiku lanu lokhazikitsidwa.”
“Musaizunze ayi chifukwa mukatero chilango cha tsiku loopsa chidzadza kwa inu.”
Komabe iwo adaipha iyo ndipo adanong’oneza bombono
Chilango chidawapeza iwo. Ndithudi mu chimenechi muli chizindikiro koma ambiri a iwo sakhulupirira
Ndithudi Ambuye wako! Indedi ndiye Mwini mphamvu zonse ndi Mwini chisoni chosatha
Anthu a Loti adakana Atumwi awo
Pamene m’bale wawo Loti adati, “Kodi inu simungaope Mulungu?”
“Ndithudi ine ndine Mtumwi wanu wokhulupirika.”
“Opani Mulungu ndipo mundimvere ine.”
“Ine sindili kupempha kuti mundilipire chifukwa cha ichi ayi chifukwa palibe wina amene angandilipire kupatula Ambuye wa zolengedwa zonse.”
“Kodi inu mwasankha kuti muzigonana ndi amuna anzanu mwa zolengedwa zonse
“Kusiya akazi amene Mulungu adakulengerani? Koma inu ndinu anthu olakwa kwambiri.”
Iwo adati, “Iwe Loti! Ngati siusiya zimenezi ndithudi udzakhala mmodzi mwa othamangitsidwa.”
Iye adati, “Ine ndili kudana ndi makhalidwe anu.”
“Ambuye wanga! Ndipulumutseni ine pamodzi ndi a pabanja langa ku ntchito zawo zoipa.”
Ndipo Ife tidamupulumutsa iye pamodzi ndi anthu ake onse
Kupatula mayi wokalamba, pakati pa amene adatsalira m’mbuyo
Ndipo Ife tidawaononga kwambiri ena onse
Ndipo choipa chidali chilango cha mvula imene idagwa pa iwo amene adachenjezedwa koma sadamvere
Ndithudi mu ichi muli phunziro koma ambiri a iwo sakhulupirira
Ndithudi Ambuye wako ndiye mwini mphamvu zonse ndi mwini chisoni chosatha
Nawonso anthu okhala m’nkhalango adakana Atumwi
Pamene Shaibu adawauza kuti, “Kodi inu simungaope Mulungu?”
“Ndithudi ine ndine Mtumwi wanu wokhulupirira.”
“Opani Mulungu ndipo mundimvere ine.”
“Ine sindikupemphani malipiro chifukwa palibe wina aliyense amene angandilipire kupatula Ambuye wa zolengedwa zonse.”
“Perekani muyeso oyenera ndipo musachepetse.”
“Yesani ndi miyeso yabwino.”
“Ndipo musawachepetsere anthu zinthu zawo kapena kulowetsa chisokonezo m’dziko.”
“Muopeni Iye amene adakulengani inu ndi mibadwo yakale.”
Iwo adati, “Ndithudi iwe walodzedwa.”
“Iwe ndiwe munthu wolingana ndi ife. Ndithudi ife tili kuganiza kuti iwe uli kunama.”
“Tigwetsere mtambo kuchokera kumwamba ngati zimene uli kunena ndi zoonadi.”
Iye adati, “Ambuye wanga amadziwa kwambiri chimene inu mumachita.”
Iwo adamukana iye kotero chilango cha thambo ndi moto chidawaononga. Ichi chidali chilango cha tsiku loopsa
Ndithudi mu chimenechi muli chiphunzitso koma ambiri a iwo sakhulupirira
Ndithudi Ambuye wako ndiye Mwini mphamvu zonse ndi Mwini chisoni chosatha
Buku lolemekezekali lavumbulutsidwa ndi Ambuye wa zolengedwa zonse
Mzimu wokhulupirika udabweretsa Bukuli
Ku mtima wako kuti ukhoza kuchenjeza mitundu ya anthu
Mu chinenero chomveka cha Chiarabu
Ndithudi lili kupezeka mu mawu a Mulungu akale
Kodi si chizindikiro kwa iwo kuti anthu ophunzira a ana a Israyeli amalidziwa
Ngati Ife tikadaivumbulutsa kwa munthu wa mtundu wina uliwonse yemwesi wa Chiarabu
Kuti iye ailakatule kwa iwo ndipo sakadakhulupirira iwo mwa Bukulo
Kotero Ife tidaipanga iyo kuti ilowe m’mitima ya anthu ochitazoipa
Iwosadzakhulupiriramuilompakapamene adzaona chilango chowawa
Ndipo icho chidzadza kwa iwo mwadzidzidzi pamene iwo sakudziwa
Ndipo iwo adzati, “Kodi ife sitidzapatsidwanso nthawi?”
Kodi iwo angafune kuti chilango chathu chidze msanga
Tandiuza. Ngati Ife titawalola kukhala mu mtendere wa zaka zambiri
Ndipo pambuyo pake chilango chimene chidalonjezedwa chidza pa iwo
Chisangalalo chawo chimene adapatsidwa chidzakhala chopanda phindu
Palibe mtundu wa anthu umene tidaonongapo kale umene sitidautumizire owachenjeza
Monga chenjezo ndipo Ife si ndife opondereza ayi
Si a Satana amene adabweretsa Korani ino ayi
Si koyenera kwa iwo ndiponso sangathe kutero
Ndithudi iwo amanidwa kumva za Bukuli
Musapembedze milungu ina kuonjezera pa Mulungu weniweni chifukwa mukatero mudzakhala m’gulu limene lidzalangidwa
Achenjeze abale ako amene ali pafupi ndi iwe
Ndipo onetsa chifundo kwa anthu okhulupirira amene amakutsatira iwe
Ngati iwo sakumvera iwe, unene kuti, “Ine sindidzaimbidwa mlandu chifukwa cha zimene mumachita.”
Ika chikhulupiriro chako mwa Mwini mphamvu zonse ndi Mwini chisoni chosatha
Amene amakuona pamene umaimirira popemphera
Ndi machitidwe ako pakati pa anthu opemphera
Mulungu amamva chilichonse ndipo amadziwa china chilichonse
Kodi ndi kuuzeni za munthu amene Satana amamutsikira
Iwo amadza pa munthu wabodza ndi wochimwa
Iwo amamvera mabodza okhaokha ndipo komaambiriaiwondiabodza
Alakatuliamatsatidwandi anthu ochita zoipa
Kodi simuona kuti iwo amangonena nkhani iliyonse mu zolakatula zawo
Ndipo iwo amakamba zinthu zimene iwo sachita

Kupatula okhawo amene akhulupirira ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino ndi kumakumbukira Mulungu kwambiri ndi kudziteteza pambuyo pa kuponderezedwa. Ndipo iwo amene amachita zoipa adzadziwa chimene chidzawagadabuza
Ichi ndi chivumbulutso cha Korani, Buku lofotokoza bwino
Malangizo ndi nkhani yosangalatsa kwa anthu okhulupirira
Amene amapitiriza kupemphera ndipo amapereka msonkho wothandiza anthu osauka ndiponso amakhulupirira kwambiri m’moyo umene uli nkudza
Ndithudi iwo ndi amene amakana za moyo umene uli nkudza. Ife tazipanga ntchito zawo kuti zioneke ngati zabwino motero iwo amayenda mwakhungu
Iwo adzalangidwa koposa. Ndipo m’moyo umene uli nkudza, iwo sadzapindula china chilichonse
Ndithudi iwe walandira Korani kuchokera kwa Iye amene ali ndi nzeru ndipo amadziwa chilichonse
Pamenepo Mose adauza banja lake kuti, “Ine ndili kuona moto. Ine posachedwapa ndikubweretserani nkhani kapena khala la moto kuti mukhoza kuotha.”

Ndipo pamene iye adafika pamoto paja, mawu adamveka akunena naye kuti, “odalitsidwa ndiye amene ali mu moto uwu ndiponso alionse a pamalo pozungulira. Ulemerero ukhale kwa Mulungu, Ambuye wa zolengedwe zonse.”
“Mose! Ine ndine Mulungu, Mwini mphamvu zonse ndi Mwini nzeru zonse.”
“Ponya ndodo yako pansi.” Ndipo pamene iye adaona kuti ilikuyenda ngati njoka, adatembenuka ndi kuthawa ndipo sadayang’ane m’mbuyo. “Iwe Mose!” Atumwi anga sachita mantha pamene ali ndi Ine
Akakhala iwo amene amalakwa ndipo amachita zabwino pambuyo pochita zoipa Ine ndine wokhululukira ndiponso wachisoni chosatha

“Pisa dzanja m’thumba mwako. Litulutse lili loyera ngakhale kuti siudapweteke. Ichi ndi chimodzi cha zizindikiro zisanu ndi zinayi zimene zidzaonetsedwa kwa Farawo ndi anthu ake. Ndithudi iwo ndi anthu ochimwa kwambiri.”
Pamene zizindikiro zathu zooneka bwino zinaonetsedwa kwa iwo, iwo adati, “Uwu ndiwo ufiti weniweni.”
Mitima yawo idadziwa kuti zizindikiro zidali zoona koma adazikana izo chifukwa chakulakwa ndiponso kunyada kwawo. Taona zimene zidawaonekera anthu olakwa
Ndithudi Ife tidapereka nzeru kwa Davide ndi Solomoni. Iwo adati, “Kuyamikidwa ndi kwa Iye amene watikweza ife kukhala pamwamba pa akapolo ake ambiri okhulupirira.”
Solomoniadalowam’malomwaDavide.Iye adati, “Oh inu anthu anga! Ife taphunzitsidwa chiyankhulo cha mbalame ndipo tapatsidwa zinthu zabwino zambiri. Ndithudi ichi ndi chifundo choonekeratu.”
Asirikali a nkhondo a mtundu wa majini, anthu ena ndi mbalame anasonkhanitsidwa pamaso pa Solomoni ndipo adaimitsidwa pa mizere m’magulu osiyanasiyana mogwirizana ndi maudindo
Mpaka pamene iwo anafika pa chigwa cha nyerere, nyerere ina idati, “Oh inu nyerere! Lowani ku maenje anu chifukwa mwina Solomoni pamodzi ndi Asirikali ake, akhoza kukuonongani mosadziwa.”

Solomoni adamwetulira posangalatsidwa ndi mawu ake ndipo iye adati, “Ndilangizeni Ambuye kuti ndizikuthokozani pa zabwino zonse zimene mwandipatsa ine ndi makolo anga ndiponso kuti ndizichita ntchito zabwino zimene zimakukondweretsani inu. Ndilowetseni ine ku Paradiso kudzera m’chisomo chanu, kuti ndikhale pakati pa akapolo anu angwiro.”
Iye adayendera mbalame nati, “Kodi mbalame yotchedwa mnthengu ili kuti? Kodi kapena iyo ili pamodzi ndi amene sadabwere?”
“Ndithudi ndidzailanga iyo ndi chilango chowawa kapena ndidzaipha kupatula ngati ibweretsa kwa ine chifukwa chomveka.”
Ndipo mbalame ya mnthengu siidachedwe ndipo idati, “Ndadziwa zimene iwe siudziwa ndipo ndikubweretsera nkhani yoona kuchokera ku Saba.”
“Ine ndapeza munthu wamkazi akulamulira iwo ndipo iye wapatsidwa zinthu zonse zomuyenereza ndipo ali ndi Mpando waukulu wachifumu
Ndidamupeza iye pamodzi ndi anthu ake ali kupembedza dzuwa moonjezera pa Mulungu ndipo Satana wawakongoletsera ntchito zawo zoipa ndipo wawasocheretsakunjirayoyenerandipoiwosiotsogozedwa bwino.”
Ndi kuti sapembedza Mulungu amene amaulula zobisika za kumwamba ndi pa dziko lapansi ndipo Iye amadziwa zimene inu mumabisa ndi zimene mumaulula
Mulungu! Kulibe mulungu wina koma Iye yekha. Ambuye wa mpando wa Chifumu
Solomoni adati, “Tidzaona posachedwapa ngati zimene ukunena ndi zoona kapena zabodza.”
“Pita ukapereke kalata yangayi kwa iwo ndipo ukachoke pang’ono poyembekezera yankho lawo.”
Mfumukazi ya ku Saba adati, “Oh inu nduna zanga! Ine ndalandira kalata yolemekezeka.”
Kalatayi ndi yochokera kwa Solomoni ndipo ikuti, “M’dzina la Mulungu, Mwini chifundo ndi Mwini chisoni chosatha.”
“Usadzikweze kwa ine koma bwerani nonse kwa ine modzipereka.”
Iye adati, “oh inu mafumu! Ndipatseni chilangizo chokhudza nkhani iyi ndipo sindilamula china chilichonse pokhapokha inu mutakhalapo.”
Iwo adati, “Ife ndife olimba mtima ndiponso odziwa kumenya nkhondo molimba, ndipo nkhani ili kwa iwe. Ndipo udziwe mmene ungalamulire.”
Iye adati, “Ndithudi mafumu akalowa mu mzinda amaononga mwaupandu ndi kuwasandutsa anthu olemekezeka kukhala onyozeka. Umo ndi mmene iwo amachitira.”
“Koma ine ndiwatumizira mphatso ndipo ndidzaona yankho limene a Kazembe anga adzabwere nalo.”

Ndipo pamene akazembe adadza kwa Solomoni, iye adati, “Kodi muli kundipatsa chuma chambiri? Icho chimene Mulungu wandipatsa ine ndi chabwino kuposa chuma chonse chimene wakupatsani inu. Koma inu mumasangalala ndi mphatso zanu.”
“Bwererani kwa iwo. Ife tidzapita kwa iwo ndi magulu ankhondo amene iwo sangathe kuwagonjetsa ndipo tidzawathamangitsa m’dziko lawo mochititsa manyazi ndipo iwo adzanyozeka.”
Iye adati, “oh inu mafumu! Kodi ndani amene angandibweretsere mpando wake wachifumu iwo asanabwerekwainemogonja?”
Winawamphamvu, amene adalimmodziwamajiniadati,“Inendidzakubweretseraniinu musadanyamuke pa mpando wanu. Ine ndili ndi mphamvu zonyamulira mpando ndiponso ndine wokhulupirika.”

Koma wina amene anali kudziwa Mawu a Mulungu adati “Ine ndidzakubweretserani msanga musadaphenire maso anu.” Ndipo pamene iye adaona kuti mpando wabwera kwa iye adati, “Ichi ndi chisomo cha Ambuye wanga kuti andiyese ngati ndikuthokoza kapena sindikuthokoza. Ndipo aliyense amene athokoza atero podzipezera yekha zabwino. Ndipo amene sathokoza ndithu, Ambuye wanga ali ndi zonse ndipo ndi Wolemekezeka.”
Ndipo iye adati, “Sinthani mpando wake wachifumu kuti tione ngati iye akhoza kuuzindikira kapena ayi.”

Ndipo pamene mfumukazi inadza kwa Solomoni idafunsidwa kuti, “Kodi mpando wako wachifumu ndi otere?” Iye adati, “Ukukhala ngati umenewu” ndipo ife tinadziwa kale ndipo tagonja kwa Mulungu mwamtendere.”
Zinthu zimene amapembedza zoonjezera pa Mulungu ndi zimene zamusokoneza. Iye adali mmodzi wa anthu osakhulupirira

Iye adauzidwa kuti, “Lowa mnyumba yachifumu.” Ndipo pamene iye anaiona iyo, adaganiza kuti ndi dziwe la madzi ndipo miyendo yake adaionetsa poyera. Solomoni adati, “Iyi ndi nyumba yachifumu yomatidwa ndi magalasi.” Iye adati, “Ambuye, ine ndalakwira mzimu wanga. Tsopano ndili kudzipereka pamodzi ndi Solomoni kwa Mulungu, Ambuye wazolengedwa zonse.”
A Thamoud, ndithudi, tidawatumizira m’bale wawo Saleh, amene adati, “Muzipembedza Mulungu basi.” Koma iwo adagawikana m’magulu awiri okangana
Iye adati, “Anthu anga! Kodi bwanji mufuna kubweretsa choipa msanga musanabweretse chabwino? Nanga ndi chifukwa chiyani simupempha chikhululukiro kwa Mulungu kuti mukhoza kupeza chisomo chake?”

Iwo adati, “Ife tili kuona choipa chochokera kwa iwe ndiponso kwa anthu amene amakutsatira iwe.” Iye adati, “Choipa chimene muli kuchiona chili kuchokera kwa Mulungu. Inu ndinu anthu amene muli kuyesedwa.”
M’mizinda mwawo mudali anthu asanu ndi anayi amene anali kuchita zoipa mdziko ndipo samachita zabwino ayi

Iwo adati, “Tiyeni tonse tilumbire, dzina la Mulungu, kuti timuphe nthawi ya usiku pamodzi ndi a pabanja lake lonse. Ndipo tidzawauza abale ake kuti, “Ife kudalibe pamene iwo anali kuphedwa. Ndipo zimene tili kunena ndi zoona zokhazokha.”
Iwo adachita chiwembu ndipo nafenso tidachita chiwembu iwo osadziwa chilichonse
Ndipo taona zotsatira zake za chiwembu chawo. Ife tidawaonongeratu pamodzi ndi anthu awo onse
Chifukwa chakuti iwo adalakwa, nyumba zawo zimene anali kukhalamo tsopano ndi mabwinja. Ndithudi m’zimenezi muli zizindikiro kwa anthu ozindikira
Ndipo Ife tidapulumutsa anthu onse okhulupirira ndipo anali kuopa Mulungu
Loti kwa anthu ake, “Kodi inu mukuchita zinthu zochititsa manyazi pamene muli kuona?”
“Kodi inu muli kuchita chiwerewere ndi amuna anzanu pokwaniritsa zilakolako zanu ndi kusiya akazi? Inu ndinu mbuli basi.”
“Yankho lawo silidali lina koma kuti, “Chotsani anthu a Loti mu mzinda wanu. Awa ndi anthu amene afuna kudziyeretsa.”
Ife tidamupulumutsa iye pamodzi ndi anthu ake kupatula mkazi wake amene adatsalira m’chilango
Ndipo tidawalasa iwo ndi mvula ya miyala imene idagwa pa iwo. Ndi mvula yoipa imene idagwera iwo amene adachenjezedwa
Nena, “Kuyamikidwa kukhale kwa Mulungu ndipo mtendere ukhale pa Atumwi ake amene Iye wawasankha. Kodi wabwino ndani Mulungu kapena mafano amene amawapembedza yoonjezera pa Mulungu?”

Kapena wabwino ndi Iye amene adalenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi ndi kukutumizirani mvula kuchokera kumwamba ndi kubweretsa minda ya chisangalalo? Iwo sangathe kumeretsa mitengo. Kodi pali milungu ina yoonjezera pa Mulungu weniweni? Koma iwo ndi anthu amene amafanizira ena ake kukhala ofanana ndi Mulungu

Kapena Iye amene adakhazikitsa dziko ndi kulithirira ilo ndi mitsinje ya madzi oyenda; ndipo wakhazikitsa mapiri pa dziko ndipo waika malire pakati pa nyanja ziwiri. Kodi pali mulungu wina woonjezera pa Mulungu weniweni? Koma ambiri a iwo ndi osadziwa

Kapena Iye amene amayankha mapemphero a munthu opanikizika pamene amupempha Iye ndipo amamuchotsera mavuto. Ndiyetu amene wakupatsani dziko lapansi kuti muzikhalamo. Kodi pali mulungu winanso woonjezera pa Mulungu weniweni? Ndi zazing’ono zimene mumakumbukira

Kapena ndi Iye amene amakutsogolerani mu mdima pa mtunda kapena pa nyanja ndipo amatumiza mphepo ngati yonyamula uthenga wabwino wa chisomo chake. Kodi pali mulungu winanso woonjezera pa Mulungu weniweni? Mulungu ndi wapamwamba kuposa zimene amamufanizira nazo

Kapena Iye amene poyambirira adapanga zolengedwa ndiponso amene adzatidzutsanso kukhala ndi moyo m’moyo umene uli nkudza ndiponso amene amakupatsani chakudya kuchokera ku nthaka ndi kumwamba? Kodi pali mulungu winanso woonjezera pa Mulungu weniweni? Nena, “Tionetseni chizindikiro chanu ngati zimene mukunenazi ndi zoonadi.”
Nena, “Palibe amene ali kumwamba kapena pa dziko lapansi amene amadziwa zobisika kupatula Mulungu. Ndiponso anthu sadziwa nthawi imene adzaukitsidwa kukhalanso ndi moyo.”
Kodi kuzindikira kwawo m’moyo umene uli nkudza kwakwaniritsidwa? Iwo ndi okaika pa zamoyo umene uli nkudza ndipo maso awo ndi otsekeka pa za iwo
Anthu osakhulupirira adati, “Kodi pamene ife ndi makolo anthu, tisanduka dothi tidzaukitsidwanso?”
“Ndithudi ife tidalonjezedwa ndiponso makolo athu. Ichi si china ayi koma nkhani zopanda pake za anthu akale.”
Nena, “Pitani pa dziko lonse lapansi ndipo mukaone zimene zidawaonekera anthu ochimwa.”
Usachite chisoni kapena kuvutika mu mtima chifukwa cha ziwembu zimene apanga
Ndipo iwo amati, “Kodi lonjezo limeneli lidzakwaniritsidwa liti ngati zimene muli kunenazi ndi zoona?”
Nena, “Mwina gawo lina la zimene muli kufuna kuti zidze msanga zili pafupi kudza.”
Ndipo, ndithudi, Ambuye wako ndi wokoma mtima kwa anthu, koma ambiri a iwo sathokoza ayi
Ndipo, ndithudi, Ambuye wako amadziwa zonse zimene zimabisika m’mitima mwawo ndiponso zonse zimene amaulula
Kulibe chinsinsi kumwamba kapena padziko lapansi chimene sichidalembedwe mu Buku lake lolemekezeka
Buku la Korani lili kuwauza ana a Israyeli zambiri zimene iwo amatsutsana
Ndipo limeneli ndi chenjezo ndiponso madalitso kwa anthu okhulupirira m’choonadi
Ndithudi Ambuye wako adzaweruza pakati pawo ndi chiweruzo chake. Iye ndiye Mwini mphamvu zonse ndi Mwini kudziwa za chinthu china chilichonse
Kotero iwe ika chikhulupiriro chako mwa Mulungu chifukwa iwe uli pa choonadi chenicheni
Ndithudi iwe siungathe kumupanga munthu wakufa kuti amve ndiponso siungathe kumupanga munthu osamva kuti amve kuitana kwako pamene iye atembenuka
Si udindo wako kutsogolera anthu a khungu kuti aleke kusochera. Palibe munthu amene adzakumvera kupatula okhawo amene amakhulupirira mu chivumbulutso chathu ndipo amadzipereka kwathunthu

Patsiku limene chiweruzo chathu chidzayandikira kwa osakhulupirira, Ife tidzawabweretsera chinyama chimene chidzayankhula nawo kuchokera ku dziko lapansi chifukwa munthu sanakhulupirire chivumbulutso chathu
Patsiku limeneli, tidzasonkhanitsa kuchokera ku mtundu uliwonse gululaanthuamenesadakhulupirirechivumbulutsochathu. Iwo adzasonkhanitsidwa ndi kuikidwa m’mizere
Mpaka pamene adzafike pamalo a chiweruzo, Mulungu adzati, “Kodi inu mudakana chivumbulutso changa ngakhale kuti inu simumadziwa chilichonse cha chivumbulutsocho? Kodi ndi chiyani mumachita?”
Chionongeko chidzadza pa iwo chifukwa cha zoipa zawo ndipo iwo adzasowa chowiringula
Kodi iwo saona mmene tidakonzera usiku kuti ukhale mpumulo ndi masana kuti uziwapatsa kuwala? Ndithudi mu zimenezi muli zizindikiro kwa anthu okhulupirira

Patsikulimeneli, lipengalidzalizidwandipoonseamene amakhala kumwamba ndi padziko lapansi adzagwidwa ndi mantha kupatula okhawo amene Mulungu adzafuna kuwapatula mu zimene zi. Onse adzabwera kwa Iye modzichepetsa

Iwe udzaona mapiri ndi kuwaganizira kuti ndi okhazikika koma iwo adzayenda ngati mmene mitambo imachitira. Uwu ndi mchitidwe wa Mulungu amene wakonza bwino lomwe chinthu chilichonse. Ndithudi Iye amadziwa bwino zonse zomwe mumachita
Iwo amene achita zabwino adzalandira mphotho imene ili yabwino ndipo adzakhala osakhudzidwa ndi zochititsa mantha za tsiku limeneli
Koma iwo amene achita zoipa adzaduduluzidwa pa mphumi zawo kunka ku moto. “Kodi inu simudzalandira malipiro ofanana ndi ntchito zanu?”
Nena, “Ine ndalamulidwa kutumikira Ambuye wa mzinda uno umene waupanga kuti ukhale Woyera. Zinthu zonse ndi zake. Ndipo ndalamulidwa kukhala mmodzi mwa odzipereka.”

Ndipo ndalamulidwa kuwerenga Buku la Korani. Aliyense amene atsatira njira yoyenera atero podzithandiza yekha. Kwa iye amene asochera nena “Ine si ndine kanthu kena koma mmodzi wa iwo ochenjeza anthu.”
Ndipo nena, “Kuyamikidwa kukhale kwa Mulungu! Iye adzakulangizani zizindikiro zake ndipo inu mudzazizindikira. Ambuye wanu saiwala zimene mumachita.”
Ta Sin Mim
Awa ndi mawu a m’Buku lofotokoza bwino
Tidzakuuza zina za mbiri ya Mose ndi Farawo mwachoonadi kuti uuze anthu okhulupirira
Ndithudi Farawo adadzikweza pa dziko lapansi ndipo adagawa anthu ake m’magulumagulu ndipo gulu lina iye anali kulizunza pomapha ana awo aamuna ndi kusiya ana aakazi. Ndithudi iye adali wochita zoipa
Koma chidali chifuniro chathu kuti tiwapatse zabwino anthu amene adali oponderezedwa pa dziko ndi kuwasandutsa iwo kukhala atsogoleri a anthu ndi kuwapanga iwo kulowa m’malo mwa ufumu wa Farawo
Ndikuwakhazikitsa m’dziko ndipo tinamupatsa Farawo, Hamani ndi gulu lawo la nkhondo zimene iwo anali kuopa

Ife tidauza amayi ake a Mose ponena kuti, “Muyamwitse iye koma ngati ukuda nkhawa za kukhala kwake mwamtendere, mponye mu mtsinje. Usaope ndipo usade nkhawa ayi chifukwa Ife tidzamubweretsa iye kwa iwe ndi kumupanga iye kukhala mmodzi wa Atumwi.”
Ndipo adamutola iye a banja la Farawo kuti akhoza kukhala mdani ndiponso madandaulo kwa iwo. Ndithudi Farawo, Hamani ndi Asirikali awo, onse adali ochimwa

Mkazi wake wa Farawo adati kwa iye, “Mwana uyu akhoza kubweretsa chisangalalo kwa ine ndi iwe. Musamuphe ayi. Mwina akhoza kutithandiza kapena tikhoza kumutenga kuti akhale mwana wathu.” Koma iwo sadadziwe chimene anali kuchita
Mtima wa amayi ake a Mose siumaganiza zina ayi koma za Mose yekha. Iye akadaulula za iye kukadapanda kuti Ife tidamupatsamphamvukutiapitirizekukhalawokhulupirira weniweni
Iye adati kwa mlongo wake wa Mose, “Pita umutsatire.” Iye anali kumuona kuchokera patali pamene iwo sadadziwe ayi
Tsopano Ife tidamupanga kuti azikana kuyamwa mawere a amayi ena. Mlongo wake adati kwa iwo, “Kodi ndingakulondorereni banja limene likhoza kumulera m’malo mwanu ndi kumusamala bwino?”
Ndipo tidamubweretsa iye kwa Amayi ake kuti asangalale, asiye kudandaula ndiponso kuti adziwe kuti lonjezo la Mulungu ndi loona. Koma anthu ambiri sachidziwa chimenechi
Ndipo pamene iye adakula msinkhu ndi kukhala munthu wokwana, tidamupatsa iye luntha ndi nzeru. Mmenemu ndi mmene timalipirira anthu ochita zabwino

Ndipo Iye adalowa mu mzinda, osaonedwa ndi anthu ndipo adapeza anthu awiri ali kumenyana, wina adali wa mtundu wake ndi wina wa mtundu wa adani ake. Munthu wa mtundu wake adamupempha iye chithandizo kuti agonjetse mdani wake. Ndipo Mose adamumenya mdani wake ndi dzanja lake ndipo adamupha. Mose adati, “Iyi ndi ntchito ya Satana. Ndithudi Iye ndi mdani wa munthu wosokoneza kwenikweni.”
Iye adati, “Ambuye! Ine ndidalakwira mzimu wanga kotero ndikhululukireni.” Ndipo Mulungu anamukhululukira iye chifukwa Iye ndi Mwini kukhululukira ndi Mwini chisoni chosatha
Iye adati, “Chifukwa cha chifundo chimene mwandionetsa Ambuye, ine ndili kulumbira kuti sindidzathandiza wina aliyense wochita zoipa.”

M’mawa mwake iye anali kuyenda mu mzinda ndi mantha poyembekezera mavuto. Munthu uja, amene amamuthandiza cha dzulo, adamuitananso kuti amuthandize. Mose adati, “Ndi choonekeratu kuti iwe ndiwe munthu wosokoneza.”

Ndipo pamene Mose ankati azim’menya mdani uja, munthuyo adati, “Iwe Mose! Kodi ufuna kundipha monga momwe unaphera munthu uja dzulo? Ndithudi iwe ufuna kukhala munthu wankhanza m’dziko lino ndiponso iwe siufuna kukhala mmodzi mwa anthu angwiro.”
Ndipo munthu wina adadza kuchokera ku malire a mzinda ali kuthamanga. Iye adati, “Mose! Anthu ndi mafumu ali kuchita upo woti akuphe iwe. Tuluka mu mzindawu. Ine ndili kukulangiza iwe mwachoonadi.”
Iye adachoka ku Aiguputo mwamantha, ali kuyembekeza kuti zoipa zim’peza. Anali akunena kuti, “Ambuye, ndipulumutseni ku anthu oipa.”
Ndipo pamene anali kuyandikira ku Midiyani Iye adati, “Ambuye anditsogolera ku njira yoyenera.”

Ndipo pamene adafika pa chitsime cha ku Midiyani, iye adapeza gulu la anthu aamuna amene adali kumwetsa ziweto zawo. Ndipo kuonjezera paiwo, padali akazi awiri amene anali kungosunga nkhosa zawo. Mose adati, “Kodi vuto lanu ndi chiyani?” Iwo adati, “Sitingathe kumwetsa nkhosa zathu pokhapokha abusa awa atachotsa ziweto zawo. Ndipo bambo wathu ndi munthu wokalamba.”
Mose adawamwetsera nkhosa zawo ndipo adachoka ndi kukakhala pa m’thunzi nati, “Ambuye, ine ndili kusowa zabwino zimene munganditumize.”

Mmodzi mwa akazi aja adadza kwa iye akuyenda mwamanyazi nati, “Abambo anga ali kukuitanani kuti akakulipireni chifukwa chomwetsera ziweto zathu.” Ndipo pamene Mose adadza kwa iwo, adafotokoza nkhani yake kwa iye. Bambo uja adati, “Usaope. Tsopano wapulumuka m’manja mwa anthu oipa.”
Mmodzi mwa akazi aja adati, “Atate, mulembeni ntchito munthu uyu. Munthu wabwino kumulemba ntchito ndi amene ali ndi mphamvu ndiponso wokhulupirika.”

Atate adati, “Ine ndidzakupatsa mmodzi wa ana anga aakazi kuti umukwatire ngati ungakhale zaka zisanu ndi zitatu uli kundigwirira ntchito. Koma ngati ufuna ukhoza kugwira ntchito zaka khumi. Ine sindifuna kukuzunza ayi. Ngati Mulungu afuna, udzaona kuti ine ndine munthu wangwiro.”
Mose adati, “Zimenezi zikhale pakati pa inu ndi ine. Mwa nthawi ziwirizi ine ndidzakwaniritsa ndipo pasadzakhale cholakwa kwa ine. Ndipo Mulungu ndi mboni pa zimene tili kukambiranazi.”

Ndipo pamene adamaliza nthawi yake, iye anali kupita ndi mkazi wake. Mose adaona moto kuonjezera pa phiri la Sinai. Iye adati kwa mkazi wake, “Khala pano chifukwa ndili kuona moto. Mwina mwake ndikhoza kubweretsa kuchokera kumeneko nkhani kapena mwatso woyaka umene ukhoza kuotha.”
Ndipo pamene adafika pamalo paja, iye adaitanidwa kuchokera kumbali ya manja ya chigwa pa malo odalitsika kuchokera mumtengo. “oh iwe Mose! Ndithudi, Ine ndine Mulungu, Ambuye wa zolengedwa zonse.”
“Ndipo ponya pansi ndodo yako.” Ndipo pamene adaona ndodo yake ili kuyenda ngati njoka, adatembenuka nathawa osabwevukanso. “Iwe Mose! Bwerera ndipo usaope. Iwe ndiwe mmodzi wa anthu otetezedwa.”

“Ika dzanja lako m’thumba, ndipo ilo lidzakhala loyera kwambiri lopanda chilema ndipo ika dzanja lako pamtima pako kuti uchoke mantha. Kotero zimenezi ndi zizindikiro ziwiri za Ambuye wako kwa Farao ndi mafumu ake. Mosakaika iwo ndi anthu osakhulupirira.”
Mose adati, “Ambuye wanga! Ine ndidapha mmodzi mwa anthu awo ndipo ndili ndi mantha kuti mwina akhoza kukandipha.”
“Ndipo Aroni, m’bale wanga, amayankhula bwino kuposa ine. Mutumizeni iye pamodzi ndi ine kuti akhoza kukandithandiza kuti akandiyankhulire. Ndithudi ine ndiopa kuti akandikana.”

Iye adati, “Ife tidzakuonjezera mphamvu pokhala ndi m’bale wako ndipo ndiika pa inu awiri umboni ndipo iwo sadzatha kukupwetekani inu chifukwa cha zizindikiro zathu. Inu pamodzi ndi onse amene amakutsatirani mudzapambana.”

Ndipo pamene Mose adadza kwa iwo ndi zizindikiro zathu zooneka, iwo adati, “Izi si zina ayi koma matsenga ongopeka ndiponso ife sitidamvepo kuti za mtundu uwu zinachitikapo kuchokera kwa makolo athu akale.”
Ndipo Mose adati, “Ambuye wanga amadziwa bwinobwino munthu amene amabweretsa chilangizo chochokera kwa Iye, ndiponso kwa amene tsogolo lake ndi labwino. Ndithudi anthu onse ochimwa sadzapambana ayi.”

Farawo adati, “oh inu mafumu! Inu mulibe mulungu wina amene ine ndimudziwa kupatula ine ndekha. Haman, ndipangireni ine njerwa zadothi ndipo mundimangire nyumba yaitali, yonga nsanja, kuti ndikwerepo kupita kwa Mulungu wa Mose. Ndithudi ine ndili kumuganizira kuti Mose ndi mmodzi mwa anthu abodza.”
Farawo ndi Asirikali ake adadzikweza kwambiri mu dziko la Aiguputo popanda chifukwa ndipo iwo anali kuganiza kuti sadzabwereranso kwa Ife
Ndipo tidamutenga iye pamodzi ndi asirikali ake ndipo tidawamiza m’nyanja. Ganiza chimene amaona anthu ochita zoipa
Ife tidawapanga iwo kukhala atsogoleri oitana anthu kuti apite kumoto koma pa tsiku la kuuka kwa akufa, palibe mmodzi amene adzawathandiza iwo
Ife tidawatsatira ndi matemberero m’dziko lino ndipo pa tsiku la kuuka kwa akufa iwo adzakhala anthu onyozeka
Ndipo ife tidaononga mibadwo yoyamba yakale ndipo tidamupatsa Mose Buku la Chipangano Chakale monga nyali, langizo ndi chifundo kwa anthu kuti mwina akhoza kuchenjezedwa
Iwe kudalibe, ku mbali ya kumadzulo kwa phiri, pamene Ife tinali kumupatsa Mose udindo wake ndiponso iwe kunalibe pa mwambowu

Koma Ife tidalenga mibadwo yambiri Mose atafa kale imene inali ndi moyo wautali. Iwe siunakhale pakati pa anthu a ku Midiyani ndi kumawalakatulira chivumbulutso chathu. Koma Ife ndi amene timatumiza Atumwi

Ndipo iwe kudalibe m’mbali mwa phiri la Sinai pamene tidamuitana Mose. Koma adali madalitso ochokera kwa Ambuye wako kuti ukachenjeze mtundu wa anthu umene unalipo iwe usanadze kotero kuti akhoza kuchenjezedwa

Tikanapanda kukutumiza iwe ndipo mazunzo akadawagwera chifukwa cha ntchito zawo zoipa, iwo akadati, “Ambuye, chifukwa chiyani simudatitumizire Mtumwi kotero kuti tikadatsatira mawu anu ndiponso tikadakhala okhulupirira.”

Ndipo pamene choonadi chadza kwa iwo kuchokera kwa Ife, iwo ali kufunsa kuti, “Kodi ndi chifukwa chiyani iye sadapatsidwe monga zomwe zidapatsidwa kwa Mose?” Kodi iwo sadakane zimene zidapatsidwa kwa Mose kale? Iwo amati, “Zizindikiro ziwiri za matsenga zili zothandizana.” Ndiponso amanena, “Ife sitidzakhulupirira mu china chilichonse cha zimenezi.”
Nena, “Bweretsani Buku lochokera kwa Mulungu limene lili ndi langizo labwino kuposa malangizo awa ndipo ine ndidzatsatira ngati zimene muli kunena ndi zoona.”

Ngati iwo akanika kukuyankha, dziwa kuti iwo ali kutsatira zilakolako zawo. Kodi ndani amene ali wolakwa kwambiri kuposa munthu amene amatsatira zilakolako zake opanda langizo la Mulungu? Ndithudi Mulungu satsogolera anthu olakwa
Ndithudi tatumiza mawu athu motsatana kwa iwo kuti akhoze kuchenjezedwa
Iwo amene kale tidawapatsa Buku lino lisadadze, amakhulupirira mwa ilo
Pamene limalakatulidwa kwa iwo, amati iwowo “Ife tili kulikhulupirira Bukuli chifukwa ndi choonadi chochokera kwa Ambuye wathu. Ife tidadzipereka kwathunthu kalekale mawu awa asadadze.”
Anthu awa mphotho yawo idzaperekedwa kwa iwo kawiri chifukwa iwo adapirira ndipo amagonjetsa choipa pochita chabwino ndi kumapereka gawo la chaulere pa katundu amene tidawapatsa
Ndipo iwo akamva mawu oipa, salabadira zonenazo koma amati, “Ife tili ndi ntchito zathu ndipo nanunso muli ndi ntchito zanu. Mtendere ukhale kwa inu. Ife sitifuna kugwirizana ndi anthu osadziwa.”
Iwe siungamutsogolere aliyense amene umufuna. Ndi Mulungu yekha amene amatsogolera aliyense amene Iye wamufuna. Iye amadziwa bwino anthu amene ali oyenera

Iwo amati, “Ngati ife titsatira chilangizo chako, ife tikuopakulandidwadzikolathu.”KodiIfesitidawakhazikire malo otetezedwa kumene zipatso za mtundu uliwonse zimaperekedwa ngati chakudya kuchokera kwa Ife? Ndithudi ambiri a iwo ndi anthu osadziwa
Kodi ndi mizinda ingati imene tidaononga imene idali kunyada chifukwa cha chuma chake? Kotero zimenezi ndizo nyumba zawo zimene sadakhalitsemo ndipo tsopano eni ake ndife

Ndipo Ambuye wako sadaononge mizinda mpaka pamene Iye adadzutsa kuchokera mu iyo, Mtumwi amene amalalikira za chivumbulutso chathu ndipo Ife sitidzaononga mzinda pokhapokha anthu okhala mmenemo ali olakwa
Zinthu zimene mwapatsidwa si zina koma chakudya ndiponso chionetsero chopanda pake cha m’moyo uno. Koma chimene chili ndi Mulungu ndicho chabwino ndiponso chokhalitsa. Kodi simungathe kuzindikira

Kodi anthu awiriwa ndi ofanana? Iye amene tamulonjeza lonjezo labwino ndipo adzalikwaniritsa ndi iye amene tamupatsa zokoma zambiri za m’moyo uno koma pa tsiku lachiweruzo adzakhala m’gulu la iwo olangidwa
Pa tsiku limeneli Mulungu adzawaitana ndipo adzati, “Kodi aja munkati ndi anzanga ali kuti?”

Iwo amene adzapezeka ndi mlandu wotere adzati, “Awa ndiwo anthu amene ife tidawasocheretsa. Ife tidawasocheretsa chifukwa nafenso tidali osochera. Ife tsopano tadzipatula (kuchoka mwa iwo) ndi kudza kwa inu. Si ndife amene iwo anali kupembedza.”
Ndipo kudzanenedwa kwa iwo kuti, “Itanani anzanu kuti akuthandizeni.” Iwo adzawaitana koma iwo sadzawamva ayi. Ndipo iwo adzalawa chilango chowawa. Iwo adzafunitsitsa akadatsogozedwa bwino
Tsiku limene Mulungu adzawaitana nati, “Kodi inu mudanena zotani kwa Mtumwi?”
Zodandaula zawo sizidzamveka ayi, kotero sadzatha kufunsana wina ndi mnzake
Akakhala iye amene alapa zoipa zake nakhulupirira ndipo achita ntchito zabwino, mwina akhoza kudzakhala pakati pa anthu opambana
Ndipo Ambuye wako amalenga ndi kusankha aliyense amene Iye wamufuna. Kusankha si kwawo ayi. Ulemerero ukhale kwa Mulungu ndipo Iye atalikirane ndi zimene amamufanizira nazo
Ambuye wako amadziwa zonse zimene amazibisa m’mitima mwawo ndiponso zimene amaziulula
Iye ndi Mulungu ndipo palibenso mulungu wina koma Iye yekha. Kuyamikidwa konse ndi kwake m’moyo uno ndiponso m’moyo umene uli nkudza. Ndipo chake ndi chiweruzo ndipo kwa Iye mudzabwerera
Nena, “Ndiuzeni! Ngati Mulungu atapanga usiku kuti usache mpaka pa tsiku louka kwa akufa, kodi ndi mulungu uti kupatula Mulungu weniweni amene akhoza kukupatsani usana? Kodi simukumva?”

Nena, “Ndiuzeni! Ngati Mulungu atapanga usana kuti kusade mpaka pa tsiku louka kwa akufa, kodi ndi mulungu uti kupatula Mulungu weniweni amene akhoza kukupatsani usiku umene inu mumapumulamo? Kodi inu simukuona?”
Mwachifundo chake wakupatsani usiku ndi usana kuti muzipezamo mpumulo ndi kufunafuna chisomo chake ndi kuti muzithokoza
Ndipo pa tsiku limene adzawaitana iwo nati, “Kodi ali kuti iwo amene mumaganiza kuti ndi anzanga?”

Ndipo nthawi yomweyo tidzaitana mboni kuchokera ku mtundu uliwonse ndipo tidzati, “Bweretsani umboni wanu.” Nthawi imeneyo adzadziwa kuti mwini wake choonadi ndi Mulungu ndipo zonse zimene amapeka zidzawathawira

Ndithudi Karuni, mosakayika, adali wa ku mtundu wa Mose. Koma iye amawanyoza iwo chifukwa Ife tidamupatsa nkhokwe za chuma zimene ndithudi makiyi ake samatheka kunyamulidwa ndi anthu angapo a mphamvu. Anthu ake adati kwa iye, “Usadzikundikire chifukwa Mulungu sakonda anthu odzikundikira chifukwa cha chuma.”

“Koma ufunefune, kudzera m’zimene Mulungu wakupatsa iwe, kuti upeze moyo umene uli nkudza, ndiponso usaiwale udindo wako m’dziko lino. Khala wabwino monga Mulungu wakuonetsera ubwino wake. Ndipo usalimbike pochita zoipa padziko lapansi chifukwa Mulungu sakonda anthu ochita zoipa.”

Iye adati, “Chuma ichi chidapatsidwa kwa ine chifukwa cha nzeru zanga.” Kodi iye sadadziwe kuti Mulungu adaononga m’badwo wonse wa anthu amene adali ndi mphamvu zambiri ndiponso olemera kwambiri iye asanabadwe? Anthu ochita zoipa sadzafunsidwa za machimo awo

Kotero iye adapita kwa anthu ake monyadira atavala bwino. Anthu amene adali kukonda moyo wa pa dziko lapansi adati, “Tikadakhala kuti tidali nazo ngati zinthu zimene zili ndi Karuni! Ndithudi iye ndi wolemera kwambiri.”

Koma iye amene adapatsidwa nzeru adati: “Tsoka kwa inu! Mphotho ya Mulungu m’moyo umene uli nkudza ndi yabwino kwa iwo amene amakhulupirira ndipo amachita zabwino.” Koma mphothoyo palibe amene adzailandira kupatula okhawo amene amapirira
Kotero Ife tidalamulira nthaka kuti imumeze Karuni pamodzi ndi chuma chake ndipo sadapeze wina womuthandiza kwa Mulungu ndipo iye sadathe kudziteteza

Ndipo iwo amene anali kukhumbira chuma chake chadzulo adayamba kunena kuti, “Taonani! Mulungu amapereka moolowa manja kwa aliyense amene wamufuna ndi monyalapsa kwa aliyense amene Iye wamufuna. Akadakhala kuti sadatilangize ife chisoni chake, Iye akadalamulira nthaka kuti itimeze. Taonani! anthu okana Mulungu sadzakhala opambana ngakhale pang’ono.”
Kunena za m’moyo umene uli nkudza, udzakhala wa iwo amene sadzikweza pa dziko lapansi kapena kuchita zoipa. Ndipo mapeto abwino ndi a iwo amene ali angwiro
Aliyense amene achita zabwino adzalipidwa zochuluka. Koma iye amene achita zoipa ndiponso iwo amene achita ntchito zoipa adzangolipidwa molingana ndi zimene anali kuchita

Ndithudi Iye amene adalamulira Buku la Korani kuti livumbulutsidwe kwa iwe adzakubwezera kumalo komwe udzapite. Nena, “Ambuye wanga adziwa bwino iye amene amabweretsa langizo loonadi ndiponso iye amene ndi wosochera.”
Ndipo iwe siumayembekezera kuti Buku lolemekezeka lidzavumbulitsidwa kwa iwe koma ndi chifundo chochokera kwa Ambuye wako. Kotero usavomereze zochita za anthu omwe ali osakhulupirira

Usalole wina aliyense kuti akubweze ku chivumbulutso cha Mulungu pamene chavumbulutsidwa kwa iwe ndipo aitane anthu kuti adze kwa Ambuye wako ndipo usakhale m’gulu la anthu amene amaphatikiza milungu ina ndi Mulungu weniweni
Ndipo usamphatikize mulungu wina ndi Mulungu weniweni. Kulibe mulungu wina koma Iye yekha. Zinthu zonse ndi zakutha kupatula Iye yekha. Chake ndi chiweruzo ndipo kwa Iye ndi kumene mudzabwerera
Alif. Lam Mim
Kodi anthu amaganiza kuti adzasiyidwa okha osayesedwa chifukwa anena kuti, “Ife ndife okhulupirira?”
Ndipo ndithudi Ife tidawayesa anthu amene adalipo iwo asanadze. Ndithudi Mulungu adzawazindikira iwo amene ndi olungama, ndipo ndithudi, adzawazindikira iwo amene ndi abodza
Kodi kapena iwo amene amachita zoipa amaganiza kuti	adzatithawa	ife?	Iwo	amaweruza	molakwa
Aliyense amene amakhulupirira kuti adzakumana ndi Mulungu nthawi imene Mulungu adakhazikitsa, ndithudi, idzabwera ndipo Iye ndi wakumva ndi wodziwa
Ndipo aliyense amene adzipereka kwathunthu, akudzipereka podzithandiza iye mwini. Ndithudi Mulungu ndi woima payekha ndipo Iye safuna thandizo lochokera kwa zolengedwa zake
Ndipo iwo amene amakhulupirira ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino, Ife tidzawakhululukira machimo awo ndikuwapatsa malipiro ofanana ndi ntchito zawo zabwino

Ndipo Ife tidamulamula munthu kuonetsa ubwino kwa makolo ake koma ngati iwo akuuza kuti uzindiphatikiza Ine ndi ena ake amene iwe siuwazindikira, usawamvere ayi. Kwa Ine ndiko mudzabwerera ndipo ndidzakuuzani zimene munali kuchita
Ndipo iwo amene akhulupirira ndi kumachita ntchito zabwino, ndithudi, Ife tidzawaika m’gulu la anthu angwiro

Ndipo pakati pa anthu pali iye amene amati, “Ife timakhulupirira mwa Mulungu.” Koma akangoona mavuto chifukwa chodzipereka kwa Mulungu, amaganiza kuti kuponderezedwa kwawo ndi anthu ndi mkwiyo wochokera kwa Mulungu! Ndipo ngati thandizo lidza kwa iwe kuchokera kwa Ambuye wako, ndithudi, iwo adzati, “Ife tidali kumbali yako.” Kodi mukuganiza kuti Mulungu sadziwa zonse zimene zili m’mitima mwawo pakati pa zolengedwa zake zonse
Ndithudi Mulungu amawadziwa anthu onse okhulupirira ndi anthu onse a chinyengo

Ndipo anthu osakhulupirira amanena kwa anthu okhulupirira kuti, “Tsatirani njira yathu ndipo ife tidzavomera chilango chifukwa cha kuchimwa kwanu. Iwo sadzavomera chilango china chilichonse m’malo mwawo. Ndithudi iwo ndi abodza
Iwo adzanyamula mtolo wawo pamodzi ndi mitolo ina ndi yawo. Ndipo patsiku lachiweruzo iwo adzafunsidwa kufotokoza mabodza awo
Ndipo ndithudi tidamutumiza Nowa kwa anthu ake ndipo adakhala pakati pawo zaka chikwi chimodzi kuchotsapo zaka makumi asanu. Ndipo chigumula chidawapeza ali pa uchimo
Kotero tidamupulumutsa iye pamodzi ndi iwo amene adali naye m’chombo ndipo tidachipanga icho kukhala phunziro kwa anthu a mitundu yonse
Ndipo Ife tidamupulumutsa Abrahamu pamene adati kwa anthu ake, “Pembedzani Mulungu ndipo muzimuopa Iye. Chimenecho chidzakhala chinthu chabwino kwa inu ngati mukadazindikira.”

Chifukwa inu mumapembedza mafano oonjezera pa Mulungu ndipo inu mumapeka bodza. Zinthu zimene mumapembedza zoonjezera pa Mulungu zilibemphamvuzokupatsanizofunazanu.Koteropemphani zofuna zanu kwa Mulungu ndipo muzimuthokoza Iye. Kwa Iye ndiko kumene mudzabwerera
Ndipo ngati inu mukana uthenga dziwani kuti nawonso amene adalipo inu musanadze adachita chimodzimodzi. Ndipo udindo wa Mtumwi ndi kulalikira pagulu momveka
Iwo sakuona mmene Mulungu amayambitsira chilengedwe ndiponso mmene amachibwerezanso. Ndithudi zimenezo ndi za pafupi kwa Mulungu
Nena, “Yendani paliponse pa dziko lapansi ndipo muone mmene Mulungu adayambitsira chilengedwe. Kotero Mulungu adzalenga chilengedwe chinanso. Mulungu ali ndi mphamvu pa chinthu china chilichonse.”
Iye amalanga aliyense amene wamufuna ndiponso amaonetsa chifundo chake kwa aliyense amene wamufuna. Ndipo ndi kwa Iye kumene nonse mudzabwerera
Kaya ndi pa dziko lapansi kapena kumwamba, kulibe kumene inu mungathawire. Ndipo inu mulibe wina kupatula Mulungu amene angakutetezeni kapena kukuthandizani
onse amene amakana zizindikiro za Mulungu ndiponso zokumana naye m’moyo umene uli nkudza ndiwo amene amakayika za chifundo changa. Ndipo iwo adzalandira chilango chowawa kwambiri
Yankho la anthu a Abrahamu lidali lamwano ndipo adati, “Mumuphe kapena mumutenthe.” Koma Mulungu adamupulumutsa iye ku moto. Ndithudi mu zimenezi muli phunziro kwa anthu okhulupirira

Ndipo iye adati, “Inu mwasankha kupembedza mafano kuonjezera pa Mulungu weniweni chifukwa chokweza mgwirizano wa pakati panu m’moyo uno. Koma pa tsiku lachiweruzo inu mudzakanana wina ndi mnzake. Ndipo malo anu akakhala ku moto ndipo inu simudzakhala ndi wina wokuthandizani.”
Koma Loti adamukhulupirira iye. Iye adati, “Ndidzachoka pa nyumba yanga chifukwa cha Ambuye wanga chifukwa Iye ndi wamphamvu zambiri ndi wanzeru.”

Ndipo tidamupatsa Abrahamu, Isake ndiYakobo ndipo tidakhazikitsa pakati pa ana ake utumiki ndi chivumbulutso. Ndipo Ife tidamupatsa mphotho yake m’moyo uno ndipo iye adzakhala m’moyo umene uli nkudza, pagulu la anthu olungama
Ndipo tidatumiza Loti, kotero iye adati kwa anthu ake, “Inu muli kuchita zinthu zonyansa zimene sizidachitikeponso ndi mtundu wa anthu kuyambira kalekale.”

“Kodi inu mumakaputa anthu a aamuna ndi kuchita chifwamba m’misewu ndiponso mumaphunzitsa zoipa ngakhale m’magulu anu?” Iwo sadayankhe china chilichonse kupatula kuti iwo adati, “Bweretsa pa ife chilango cha Mulungu ngati iwe ukunena zoona.”
Iye adati, “Ambuye wanga! Thandizeni polimbana ndi anthu oipawa.”
Ndipo pamene Atumwi athu adadza kwa Abrahamu, ndi nkhani ya bwino, iwo adati, “Ndithudi ife tidzaononga anthu a mu mzinda uno chifukwa anthu ake ndi osalungama.”

Iye adati, “Ndithudi mu mzindamo muli Loti.” Iwo adati, “Ife tikudziwa amene ali m’menemo. Ndithudi ife tidzamupulumutsa iye ndi omutsatira ake onse kupatula mkazi wake. Iye adzakhala m’gulu la anthu otsalira.”

Ndipo pamene Atumwi athu adadza kwa Loti, iye anada nkhawa pa zimene zingawachitikire iwo ndipo iye adaoneka wopanda mphamvu yowateteza iwo. Ndipo iwo adati, “Usaope kapena kuda nkhawa. Ndithudi ife tidzakupulumutsa iwe pamodzi ndi okutsatira ako kupatula mkazi wako. Iye adzakhala m’gulu la anthu otsalira.”
Ndithudi Ife tidzatsitsa chilango kuchokera kumwamba, kuti chilange anthu a mzinda uno chifukwa cha machimo awo
Ndithudi Ife tasiya chiphunzitso chokwanira kwa anthu ozindikira

Ndipo kwa anthu a ku Midiyani tidatumiza m’bale wawo Shaibu ndipo iye adati, “oh anthu anga! Tumikirani Mulungu ndipo opani tsiku limene lili nkudza ndipo musayambitse chisokonezo m’dziko pochita zinthu zoipa.”
Koma iwo adamukana iye, kotero chivomezi chachikulu chidadza pa iwo ndipo mitembo yawo idali lambilambi m’nyumba zawo

Ndi Aad ndi Thamoud. Chitsimikizo chake chili m’mabanja a m’mizindayi. Satana adawapangitsa kuganiza kuti ntchito zawo zoipa zidali zabwino ndipo iye adawabweza ku njira yoyenera ngakhale kuti iwo adali anthu anzeru ndi aluntha
Ndipo Ife tidaononga Karuni, Farawo ndi Hamani. Ndithudi Mose adadza kwa iwo ndi chiphunzitso chabwino koma iwo anali kukhala mwamwano m’dziko ngakhale kuti iwo sakadatha kutigonjetsa Ife

Kotero tidalanga aliyense chifukwa cha machimo ake. Pakati pa iwo padali iwo amene tidawatumizira mvula yamkuntho, ndipo pakati pawo padali iwo amene adavutika ndi mphenzi, ndipo pakati pawo padalinso iwo amene adamezedwa ndi nthaka ndipo padalinso iwo amene tidawamiza ndipo Mulungu sadalakwe ayi koma iwo ndiwo amene adalakwira mizimu yawo

Fanizo la iwo amene amasankha owateteza kuonjezera pa Mulungu ndi Kangaude amene amamanga nyumba yake yaulusi. Ndipo ndithudi iwo akadayenera kudziwa kuti nyumba ya Kangaude ndi imodzi mwa nyumba zosalimba
Ndithudi Mulungu amadziwa chilichonse chimene iwo amapembedza kuonjezera pa Iye ndipo Iye ndi wamphamvu ndi wanzeru
Ndipo zitsanzozi tili kuziulula chifukwa cha anthu koma palibe amene amazizindikira koma ophunzira okha
Mulungu adalenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi mwachoonadi. Ndithudi muli phunziro mu zimenezi kwa anthu okhulupirira

Lakatula zimene zavumbulutsidwa kwa iwe kuchokera m’Bukundipopitirizakupemphera. Ndithudimapemphero amateteza munthu ku machimo ndi zinthu zoipa. Ndithudi kukumbukira Mulungu ndi chinthu chachikulu ndipo Mulungu amadziwa zonse zimene mumachita

Ndipo musatsutsane ndi anthu okhulupirira za m’Buku pokhapokha kutakhala koyenera kutero, kupatula okhawo amene amachita zoipa. Nena, “Ife timakhulupirira mu izo zimene zavumbulutsidwa kwa ife ndi zimene zidavumbulutsidwa kwa inu ndipo Mulungu wathu ndi Mulungu wanu ndi mmodzi ndipo ife tadzipereka kwa Iye.”
Ndipokotero Ifetavumbulutsa Bukulolemekezekakwa iwe. Kotero onse amene tawapatsa Buku amakhulupirira mwa ilo ndipo palibe amene amakana chivumbulutso chathu kupatula anthu osalungama
Ndipo iwe siudalakatule za m’Buku lina ili lisanadze. Ndipo iwe siudalembe Buku lina lililonse ndi manja ako. Zikadatero, ndithudi, anthu oyankhula zachabechabe akadakayika
Iyayi! Izi ndi ziphunzitso zomveka zimene zili m’mitima ya iwo amene adapatsidwa nzeru ndipo palibe amene amakana chiphunzitso chathu kupatula wosalungama
Iwo amati, “Bwanji Ambuye wake sadamupatse zizindikiro?” Nena, ” Zizindikiro zonse zili ndi Mulungu ndipo ine ndine mchenjezi chabe.”
Kodi sizidakwanire kuti tavumbulutsa Buku lolemekezeka kwa iwe limene lili kuwerengedwa kwa iwo? Ndithudi m’Bukuli muli chifundo ndi chikumbutso kwa anthu okhulupirira

Nena, “Mulungu ndi mboni yokwana pakati pa ine ndi inu. Iye amadziwa chimene chili kumwamba ndi pa dziko lapansi.” Ndipo iwo amene amakhulupirira zabodza, ndiponso sakhulupirira mwa Mulungu, amenewa, ndi anthu olephera

Iwo amakukakamiza kuti ubweretse chilango msanga. Ndipo zikadakhala kuti nthawi yake siidakhazikitsidwe kale, ndithudi, chilango chikadakhala chitadza kale pa iwo. Ndithudi icho chidzadza pa iwo mwadzidzidzi pamene iwo sali kuchiganizira
Iwo ali kukukakamiza kuti ubweretse chilango. Ndithudi Gahena idzadzadza ndi anthu osakhulupirira
Patsiku limene chilango chidzadza pa iwo kuchokera kumwamba ndi padziko lapansi mawu adzati, “Lawani inu zipatso za ntchito zanu.”
oh inu akapolo anga amene mwakhulupirira! Ndithudi dziko langa lili ndi malo ambiri. Kotero ndipembedzeni Ine ndekha
Mzimu uliwonse udzalawa imfa. Pomaliza nonse mudzabwererakwa Ife

Ndipoiwoameneamakhulupirira ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino, otere tidzawapatsa malo kumwamba amene pansi pake pamayenda mitsinje kuti akhale m’menemo mpaka kale kale. Eti kukoma mphotho ya iwo amene amachita zabwino
Iwo amapirira ndipo amaika chikhulupiriro chawo mwa Ambuye wawo ndi Mtetezi wawo
Kodi zilipo zolengedwa zingati zimene sizisunga chakudya chawo? Ndi Mulungu amene amazidyetsa izo pamodzi ndi inu nomwe. Ndipo Iye ndi wakumva ndi wodziwa

Ndithudi ngati iwe utawafunsa kuti kodi ndani amene adalenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi ndiponso amene adalamula dzuwa ndi mwezi kumvera malamulo ake? Ndithudi iwo adzayankha kuti ndi Mulungu. Nanga ndi chifukwa chiyani iwo amakana choonadi
Mulungu amapereka moolowa manja kwa aliyense amene Iye wamufuna ndipo amamana aliyense amene Iye wamufuna. Ndithudi Mulungu amadziwa chinthu china chilichonse

Ngati iwe ungawafunse kuti kodi ndani amene amagwetsa mvula ndipo amapereka moyo ku nthaka imene idali ya kufa? Ndithudi iwo adzayankha kuti, “Ndi Mulungu.” Nena “Kuyamikidwa konse kukhale kwa Iye.” Iyayi, ambiri a iwo sazindikira
Ndipo moyo wa padziko lapansi siuli kanthu koma masewera ndi kongotayira nthawi. Ukakhala moyo umene uli nkudza, umenewo ndiwo weniweni, iwo akadadziwa
Kotero iwo akamakwera zombo amapempha kwa Mulungu modzipereka ndi modzichepetsa. Koma Iye akawafikitsa pa mtunda mwaubwino, Ah! iwo amamufanizira Iye ndi zina zake
Kotero iwo amaonetsa kusathokoza pa zimene tawapatsa kuti akhoza kusangalala; ndipo iwo adzazindikira posachedwapa
Kodi iwo saona kuti tateteza malo odalitsika pamene anthu ena ali kutengedwa mwankhanza pa malo owazungulira? Kodi iwo adzakhala ali kukhulupirirabe zabodza ndi kukana ubwino wa Mulungu

Kodi woipitsitsa ndani kuposa munthu amene amapeka bodza lokhudza Mulungu kapena amene amati choonadi ndi chabodza pamene auzidwa za icho? Kodi Gahena siidzakhala malo okhalamo anthu onse osakhulupirira
Akakhala iwo amene amalimbikira kugwira ntchito yathu,ndithudi, Ife tidzawatsogolera ku njira zathu. Ndithudi Mulungu amakhala ndi iwo amene amachita zabwino
Alif Lam Mim
Aroma agonjetsedwa
M’dziko loyandikana nalo ndipo iwo atagonja, pambuyo pake adzapambana
M’zaka zowerengeka. Mulungu ndiye Mwini ulamuliro ndipo pa tsiku limeneli onse okhulupirira adzakondwera
Ndi chithandizo cha Mulungu. Iye amathandiza aliyense amene wamufuna. Iye ndi wamphamvu, ndiponso Mwini chisoni chosatha
Ili ndi lonjezo la Mulungu. Mulungu saphwanya lonjezo lake ndipo anthu ambiri sadziwa
Iwo amangodziwa zokhazo zimene amaziona za m’moyo uno koma za m’moyo umene uli nkudza, iwo safuna kumva china chilichonse cha izo

Kodi iwo saganizira pa okha kuti Mulungu adalenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi ndi zinthu zonse zimene zikhala m’menemo mwachoonadi ndi mwa kanthawi yokhazikitsidwa? Ndipo, ndithudi, anthu ambiri amakana zoti adzakumana ndi Ambuye wawo

Kodi iwo sadayende pa dziko ndi kuona zimene zidawaonekera anthu amene adalipo kale? Iwo adali ndi mphamvu zambiri kuposa awa, ndipo adakumba nthaka ndiponso adamanga pa nthakayo nyumba zambiri kuposa zimene awa amanga. Ndipo kudadza kwa iwo Atumwi awo ndi chiphunzitso chomveka ndipo sikudali koyenera kuti Mulungu awachitire zinthu zosalungama koma kuti iwo adalakwira mizimu yawo
Choipa chidatsata munthu amene anali kuchita zoipa chifukwa iwo adakana chiphunzitso cha Mulungu ndipo anali kuwaseka iwo
Mulungu ndiye amene amalenga zolengedwa ndipo adzazibwereza ndipo ndi kwa Iye kumene mudzabwerera
Ndipo pa nthawi imene ola lidzadza, anthu onse ochita zoipa adzakhala ndi nkhawa
Ndipo iwo sadzakhala ndi ena alionse owathandiza ochokera pakati pa milungu yawo imene anali kupembedza kuonjezera pa Mulungu weniweni ndipo iwo adzakhala okana milungu yawo
Ndipo pa nthawi imene ola lidzadza, pa nthawi imeneyi, iwo adzasiyanitsidwa wina ndi mnzake
Ndipo onse amene adakhulupirira ndipo adachita ntchito zabwino, iwo adzasangalatsidwa m’munda wa Paradiso
Iwo amene sadakhulupirire ndipo adakana chiphunzitso chathu ndi kukumana kwa m’moyo umene uli nkudza, awa ndiwo amene adzatengedwa kupita ku chilango
Kotero lemekezani Mulungu pamene mulowa nthawi ya madzulo ndi pamene mulowa nthawi ya m’mawa
Inde. Kwa Iye kukhale kuyamikidwa kumwamba ndi padziko lapansi ndiponso pa nthawi yamasana ndi yamadzulo
Iye ndiye amene amadzutsa anthu kuchokera ku anthu akufa ndipo amadzutsa anthu akufa kuchokera ku anthu amoyo ndiponso amapereka moyo ku nthaka ikafa. Ndipo mmenemo ndi mmene mudzaukitsidwire
Ndipo chimodzi cha zizindikiro zake ndi chakuti Iye adakulengani inu kuchokera ku fumbi, ndipo inu, ndinudi, anthu amene mudamwazidwa

Ndipo pakati pa zizindikiro china ndi chakuti Iye adalenga akazi kuchokera mwa inu kuti mukhoza kupeza mpumulo mwa iwo ndipo adaika pakati panu chikondi ndi chisoni. Ndithudi muli phunziro muichi kwa anthu amene amaganiza bwino

Ndipo pakati pa zizindikiro zake ndi kalengedwe ka kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi ndi kusiyana kwa zilankhulo zanu ndiponso maonekedwe a makungu anu. Ndithudi mu chimenechimulizizindikirokwaanthuophunzira
Ndipo pakati pa zizindikiro zake ndi kugona kumene mumagona usiku ndi usana kufunafuna chisomo chake. Ndithudi mu chimenechi muli chizindikiro kwa anthu amene amatha kumva

Ndipo pakati pa zizindikiro zake ndi chakuti Iye amakuonetsani mphezi imene imakuchititsani mantha ndiponso kukupatsani chikhulupiriro. Ndipo amatumiza mvula kuchokera ku mitambo ndiponso amapereka moyo ku nthaka ikafa. Ndithudi mu chimenechi muli zizndikiro kwa anthu ozindikira

Ndipo pakati pa zizindikiro zake ndi chakuti kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi zimadzichepetsa potsatira malamulo ake ndipo pamene Iye akuitanani inu kamodzi kokha kuchokera m’nthaka, Taonani inu mudzadza mwamsanga msanga
Ndipo chilichonse chimene chili kumwamba ndi padziko lapansi ndi chake ndipo zonse zimamumvera Iye

Ndipo Iye ndiye amene amayambitsa chilengedwe ndipo adzachibwerezanso ndipo zimenezi ndi zapafupi kwa Iye. Ndipo wake ndi ulemerero kumwamba ndi padziko lapansi. Ndipo Iye ndiye Mwini mphamvu zonse ndi Mwini nzeru zonse

Iye ali kupereka chitsanzo chokhudza inu nomwe. Kodi inu muli nawo akapolo amene amakhala anzanu pa zinthu zimene takupatsani ndipo kuti mumagawana nawo zinthuzo mofanana ndiponso mumawaopa iwo monga momwe mumaoperana? Mmenemo ndi mmene timasiyanitsira chiphunzitso chathu kwa anthu amene amazindikira
Iyayi! onse osalungama amatsatira zilakolako zawo mosadziwa. Kotero ndani angatsogolere iye amene Mulungu wamusocheretsa? Ndipo iwo sadzakhala ndi wowathandiza

Kotero dzipereke kwathunthu ku chipembedzo choonadi, chipembedzo, chenicheni, chimene Mulungu adalamula kuti munthu ayenera kutsatira. Chilengedwe chimene Mulungu adalenga mtundu wa anthu sichingasinthidwe. Ndithudi pali Mulungu, icho ndicho chipembedzo choona. Koma ambiri a mtundu wa anthu sadziwa
Lapani kwa Iye ndiponso muopeni Iye. Pitirizani kupemphera nthawi zonse ndipo musakhale inu pakati pa iwo amene amafanizira milungu ina ndi Mulungu weniweni
Pali anthu amene amagawa chipembedzo chawo ndi kukhala mipingo yosiyanasiyana ndipo mpingo uliwonse umasangalala ndi zimene uli nazo

Ndipo pamene mavuto adza pa anthu, iwo amalira kwa Ambuye wawo ndi kudza kwa Iye modzichepetsa. Koma pamene Mulungu awaonetsa gawo lachisoni chochokera kwa Iye Mwini, ena a iwo amayamba kupembedza milungu ina yoonjezera pa Ambuye wawo
Akhala ngati ali kuonetsakusathokozapazimenetawachitira. Basangalalani mwa kanthawi kochepa ndipo posachedwapa mudzadziwa kupusa kwanu
Kodi kapena Ife tidawatumizira lamulo limene limanena za zinthu zimene iwo amazipembedza zoonjezera pa Mulungu

Ndipo pamene tiwaonetsera anthu chifundo chathu, iwo amasangalala kwambiri chifukwa cha chifundocho ndipo ngati choipa chidza pa iwo chifukwa cha zimene iwo achita ndi manja awo, taonani! Iwo amadandaula kwambiri
Kodi iwo saona kuti Mulungu amapereka moolowa manja kwa aliyense amene Iye wamufuna ndiponso zomupatsazochepa munthu yemwe wamufuna. Ndithudi mu chimenechi muli phunziro kwa anthu okhulupirira
Kotero apatseni zosowa zawo abale anu, anthu osauka ndi a paulendo. Ichi ndicho chinthu chabwino kwambiri kwa iwo amene afuna chisangalalo cha Mulungu ndipo awa ndiwo amene ali opambana

Chimene mumapereka ngati chiongoladzanja kuti chionjezere chuma cha anthu, sichidzakhala ndi chionjezero kwa Mulungu. Koma zopereka zimene mupereka ngati chaulere ndi cholinga chopeza madalitso a Mulungu ndi chimenechi chimene chidzaonjezeredwa kwambirimbiri

Ndi Mulungu amene anakulengani inu amene amakupatsani zofuna zanu. Iye adzakonza kuti mufe patsogolopakepanondipokenakaadzakupatsaninsomoyo. Kodi chilipo china chilichonse chimene mungachifanizire ndi chimene chingachite zimenezi? Ulemerero ukhale kwa Iye ndipo Iye akhale zopambana kuposa zonse zimene amazifanizira ndi Iye
Zinthu zoipa zalowa m’dziko ndiponso m’nyanja chifukwa cha ntchito za anthu zimene amachita ndi manja awo. Mulungu akhoza kuwalawitsa chilango chifukwa cha ntchito zawo kuti mwina athe kutembenuka
Nena “Pitani paliponse pa dziko ndi kuona zimene zidawaonekera anthu amene adalipo kale. Ambiri a iwo adali opembedza mafano.”
Kotero dziperekeni kwathunthu ku chipembedzo choona lisanadze tsiku loopsa kuchokera kwa Mulungu limene silidzatheka kulizemba. Pa tsiku limeneli anthu adzagawidwa m’magulu
onse osakhulupirira adzalangidwa chifukwa cha kusakhulupirira kwawo ndipo onse amene amachita ntchito zabwino adzadzisungira zinthu zabwino kumwamba
Ndipo Iye adzawapatsa malipiro abwino onse amene amakhulupirira ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino kuchokera ku zokoma zake. Ndipo Iye sakonda anthu osakhulupirira

Ndipo chimodzi mwa zizindikiro zake ndi chakuti amatumiza mphepo imene imabweretsa zabwino ndi cholinga choti mulawe chisomo chake ndiponso kuti zombo ziyende mwamalamulo ake ndiponso kuti inu muzifunafuna chifundo chake ndi kumuthokoza

Ndithudi Ife tidatumiza, Atumwi kwa anthu awo iwe usanabadwe ndipo iwo adadza kwa iwo ndi chiphunzitso choyenera. Ife tidapereka chilango kwa anthu ochimwa ndipo kuthandiza anthu okhulupirira ndi udindo wosatha kwa Ife

Mulungu ndiye amene amatumiza mphepo kuti iyendetse mtambo ndipo amaumwaza mlengalenga monga momwe wafunira. Iye amauphwanya ndipo inu mumaona mvula ili kugwa kuchokera mu mtambowo. Iye amagwetsa mvula pa akapolo ake amene wawafuna. Taonani! Iwo amakhala osangalala
Ngakhale kuti, iyo isanadze, iwo anali kuda nkhawa
Taonani zizindikiro za chisoni cha Mulungu mmene amaperekera moyo ku nthaka imene inali yakufa. Ndithudi Iye adzadzutsa zakufa kuti zikhale zamoyo. Iye ali ndi mphamvu pa chinthu china chilichonse
Ndipo ngati Ife tikatumiza mphepo imene imapangitsa mbewu zawo kusanduka za chikasu, iwo amakhala osathokoza
Ndithudi iwe siungathe kumupanga munthu wakufa kuti amve ndiponso siungathe kumupanga munthu wosamva kuti amve kuitana pamene iwo atembenuka ndi kuthawa
Ndipo iwe siungathe kumutsogolera munthu wakhungu kuti asiye kulakwa kwake. Palibe amene adzakumvera kupatula okhawo amene amakhulupirira mu chiphunzitso chathu

di Mulungu amene adakulengani inu ofoka ndipo adakupatsani mphamvu pambuyo pa kufoka. Ndipo atakupatsani mphamvu adakupatsani kufoka ndi imvi. Iye amalenga chilichonse chimene wafuna ndipo ndiye amene amadziwa zonse ndipo ndiye Mwini mphamvu
Ndipo pamene ola lidzadza, anthu ochimwa adzalumbira kuti adangokhala ola limodzi lokha. Kotero iwo amakhala onamizidwa

Ndipo iwo amene adapatsidwa nzeru ndi chikhulupiriro adzati, “Ndithudi inu mwakhala molingana ndi malamulo a Mulungu mpaka pa tsiku louka kwa akufa. Kotero ili ndilo tsiku louka kwa akufa koma inu simunalidziwe ayi.”
Koma patsiku limeneli zodandaula zawo sizidzawathandiza anthu onse ochimwa ndipo sizidzamveka ayi

Ndithudi m’Buku ili la Korani anthu tawaikiramo zitsanzo zambiri zosiyanasiyana ndipo ngati iwe utawabweretsera chiphunzitso iwo amene sakhulupirira adzati, “Iwe siuli kutsatira china chilichonse koma bodza ndi matsenga.”
Mmenemo ndi mmene Mulungu amatsekera mitima ya anthu osadziwa
Kotero pirirani. Lonjezo la Mulungu ndi loona ndipo usalole anthu opanda chikhulupiriro kuti akuderere iwe
Alif Lam Mim
Awa ndi mawu a m’Buku la nzeru
Chilangizo ndi chifundo kwa anthu angwiro
Amene amapemphera nthawi zonse, amene amapereka msonkho wothandiza anthu osauka ndipo amakhulupirira m’moyo umene uli nkudza
Amenewa ndiwo amene atsogozedwa bwino ndi Ambuye wawo ndipo ndithudi adzakhala opambana

Koma pakati pa anthu, alipo ena amene amagula nkhani zopanda pake ndi zopanda tanthauzo ndi cholinga chosocheretsa anthu ku njira ya Mulungu ndi kuipanga iyo kukhala chinthu choseketsa. Awa adzalandira chilango chochititsa manyazi

Ndipo pamene chivumbulutso chathuchilakatulidwakwaiye, iyeamatembenukamonyada kuoneka ngati kuti sadamve china chilichonse, kapena ngati kuti m’makutu mwake muli phula kotero muuzeni za chilango chowawa
Akakhala iwo amene akhulupirira ndipo amachita ntchito za bwino, ndithudi, adzakhala ku Paradiso
Kukhalamo mpaka kalekale ndi lonjezo loona la Mulungu. Ndipo Iye ndiye Mwini mphamvu ndipo ndi wanzeru zonse

Iye adalenga kumwamba popanda nsanamira monga muonera ndipo adalenga mapiri pa dziko lapansi kuti mwina dziko likhoza kuyenda pamodzi ndi inu. Ndipo m’dzikomo adaikamo nyama za mtundu uliwonse. Ndipo ife timatumiza mvula kuchokera ku mtambo ndipo timameretsa mbewu za mitundu yosiyanasiyana
Ichi ndi chilengedwe cha Mulungu ndipo ndionetseni zimene iwo amene amakhala pafupi naye adalenga. Iyayi, anthu opanda chilungamo ndi olakwa

Ndithudi Ife tidamupatsa nzeru Luqman ponena kuti, “Thokozani Mulungu. Aliyense amene amathokoza Mulungu, amathokoza chifukwa cha mzimu wake ndipo aliyense amene sathokoza, ndithudi, Mulungu sasowa kanthu ndipo ndi wolemekezeka.”
Ndi pamene Luqman adamuuza mwana wake adamulangiza kuti, “Mwana wanga usamafanizire Mulungu ndi china chilichonse chifukwa ndi tchimo loopsa.”

Ndipo Ife timamulamula munthu kuonetsa chifundo kwa makolo ake. Movutika amayi ake adamubereka iye ndipo m’zaka ziwiri adamuyamwitsa. Kotero, thokozani Ine ndiponso thokozani makolo anu chifukwa ndi kwa Ine kumene mudzabwerera

Koma ngati akuuza kuti uzindifanizira Ine ndi china chake chimene siuchidziwa, usawamvere. Aonetsere chifundo ndipo utsatire zochita za iye amene amalapa kwa Ine ndi kundimvera. Ndipo kwa Ine ndi kumene nonse mudzabwerera ndiponso ndidzakuuzani zonse zimene mudachita

“oh mwana wanga! Choipa ngakhale chitakhala ngati njere ya mpiru imene idakwiriridwa m’kati mwa mwala kapena kwina kulikonse kumwamba kapena pa dziko lapansi, Mulungu adzachitulutsa. Mulungu ali ndi nzeru ndiponso amadziwa chinthu china chilichonse.”

“Oh mwana wanga! Limbikira kupemphera, khazikitsa chilungamo ndipo udziletse kuchita zoipa. Khala opirira pa chilichonse chimene chidza pa iwe.” Ndithudi! Awa ndi malamulo ofunika amene adalamula Mulungu ndipo ayenera kutsatidwa
“Usanyodole anthu kapena kuyenda modzitukumula pa dziko. Mulungu sakonda anthu odzitukumula.”
“Ndipo uyenera kukhala wofatsa ndipo mawu ako azikhala otsika chifukwa mawu aukali kwambiri ndi kulira kwa bulu.”

Kodi simuona kuti Mulungu wapanga zinthu zimene zili kumwamba ndiponso zimene zili padziko lapansi kukumverani inu ndipo adakupatsani inu zabwino zooneka ndi zosaoneka ndi maso? Ndipo pakati pa anthu pali iye amene amatsutsa zinthu zokhudza Mulungu ngakhale iye sadziwa china chilichonse, kapena chilangizo kapena Buku lopereka muuni

Ndipo zikanenedwa kwa iwo kuti: Tsatirani zimene Mulungu wavumbulutsa iwo amati, Iyayi. Ife sititsatira china chilichonse koma zokhazo zimene tidapeza makolo athu ali kutsatira. Ngakhale kuti Satana ali kuwaitanira iwo ku chilango cha moto
Aliyense amene adzipereka kwa Mulungu ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino, amagwiritsa chotsekulira chimene chiyenera kugwiridwa ndipo kwa Mulungu zinthu zonse zidzabwerera

Koma ngati wina akana kukhulupirira, usalole kuti kusakhulupirira kwakeko kuti kukumvetse chisoni. Kwa Ife, anthu onse adzabwerera ndipo tidzawauza zoona za ntchito zawo. Mulungu amadziwa bwino zonse zimene zili m’mitima mwa anthu
Ife timawalekerera pa kanthawi kochepa ndipo pomaliza Ife tidzawakankha kupita ku chilango chowawa
Ndipo ngati iwe uwafunsa kuti ndani amene adalenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi, ndithudi, iwo adzati, “Mulungu.” Nena, “Ulemerero ukhale kwa Mulungu.” Iyayi! Ambiri a iwo sadziwa
Chilichonse chimene chili kumwamba ndi pa dziko lapansi ndi cha Mulungu. Ndithudi Mulungu sasowa chilichonse ndipo ndi woyamikidwa

Ndipo kukadakhala kuti mtengo uliwonse umene uli pa dziko lapansi udasanduka kukhala cholembera ndipo nyanja kusanduka kukhala inki mothandizidwandi nyanja zina zisanu ndi ziwiri ndithudi, mawu a Mulungu sakadatha. Ndithudi Mulungu ndi wamphamvu ndi waluntha
Kalengedwe kanu ndi kuukitsidwa kwanu kwa akufa si chinthu chovuta ayi. Ndithudi Mulungu ndi wakumva ndi wowona

Kodi inu simuona mmene Mulungu amasandulizira usiku kuti ukhale usana ndi usana kuti ukhale usiku ndipo wapangira dzuwa ndi mwezi kuti zizikumverani inu? Ndiponso kodi simuona kuti chilichonse chimayenda m’njira yake mpaka pa nthawi yokhazikitsidwa ndipo Mulungu amadziwa zonse zimene inu mumachita
Ichi ndi chifukwa chakuti Mulungu ndiye choonadi ndipo kuti chimene iwo amapembedza kuonjezera pa Mulungu ndi chinthu wamba chabe. Mulungu ndi wapamwamba ndi wamkulu
Kodiinusimuonammenezombozimayenderapanyanja mwachisomo cha Mulungu ndi mmene amakuonetserani inu zizindikiro zake? Ndithudi muli chiphunzitso mu zimenezi kwa anthu olimbikira ndiponso kwa oyamika

Ndipo pamene mafunde okhala ngati mapiri awaphimba, iwo amapempha kwa Mulungu modzichepetsa. Koma Iye akangowafikitsa bwino pa mtunda, ena a iwo amatsatira njira ya pakati ndipo palibe amene amakana chiphunzitso chathu koma yekhayo amene sathokoza ndiponso amene ndi wamwano

oh anthu inu! opani Ambuye wanu ndipo liopeni tsiku limene kholo silidzathandiza mwana wake kapena mwana kuthandiza kholo lake. Ndithudi lonjezo la Mulungu ndi loona. Kotero musalole moyo wa padziko lino lapansi kuti ukunyengeni inu kapena kuti Satana akunyengeni pa nkhani zokhudza Mulungu

Ndithudi Mulungu ndiye yekha amene amadziwa za kudza kwake kwa tsiku lachiweruzo. Ndiye amene amatsitsa mvula ndiponso amadziwa zimene zili m’mimba mwa akazi. Ndipo iwo amene amaswa malamulo, malo awo okhala ndi kumoto ndipo nthawi zonse zimene iwo adzafuna kuchokako, adzabwezedwanso komweko. Ndipo kudzanenedwa kwa iwo kuti, “Lawani ululu wa moto umene munkati ndi bodza.”
